name: Data visualisation and Cartography - ADDA
description: DVAC is a 1 - 2 week self enrolment, self paced, online course that equips students with skills in data visualisation and cartography.

SDGs.evidenceText: Drone technology and associated data are used in agriculture to enhance and improve production
Drone visualisation is used to map cargo drone routes for last mile delivery
Map data used for urban planning and resilience
Drone collected data are used for various climate applications
